Recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Recipes.preparation: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, fry bacon until crispy. Mix eggs with Parmesan cheese. Combine cooked spaghetti with egg mixture and crispy bacon. Season with black pepper.
Recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce made from eggs and Parmesan cheese, topped with crispy bacon.

Recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
Recipes.preparation: Slice chicken breast and stir-fry in a pan with chopped garlic until browned. Add sliced bell peppers and onion. Cook until vegetables are tender. Stir in soy sauce.
Recipes.description: Quick and flavorful stir-fry with tender chicken, crisp vegetables, and a savory soy sauce.

Recipes.name: Caprese Salad
Recipes.preparation: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Arrange alternating slices on a plate. Garnish with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
Recipes.description: Simple and refreshing salad with ripe tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and fragrant basil, drizzled with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Add pepper to taste

Recipes.name: Beef Tacos
Recipes.preparation: Cook ground beef in a skillet, then stir in taco seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and diced tomatoes.
Recipes.description: Classic Mexican dish featuring seasoned ground beef stuffed into warm tortillas, topped with crisp lettuce and juicy tomatoes.

Recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
Recipes.preparation: Dice potatoes and carrots. Chop onion. Cook vegetables in a pot with curry paste and coconut milk until tender.
Recipes.description: A fragrant and comforting curry with tender potatoes, sweet carrots, and onions in a creamy coconut sauce infused with curry spices.

Recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
Recipes.preparation: Rub salmon fillets with minced garlic, olive oil, and salt. Grill until fish is cooked through. Serve with lemon wedges.
Recipes.description: Juicy grilled salmon seasoned with garlic and lemon, perfect for a quick and healthy dinner option.

Recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
Recipes.preparation: Saut√© chopped onion and sliced mushrooms. Add Arborio rice and stir until coated. Gradually add vegetable broth while stirring until rice is cooked. Stir in grated Parmesan cheese.
Recipes.description: Creamy and savory risotto infused with the earthy flavors of mushrooms and finished with a touch of Parmesan cheese.

Recipes.name: Beef Stew
Recipes.preparation: Brown beef stew meat in a pot. Add chopped potatoes, carrots, and onion. Pour in beef broth. Simmer until meat is tender and vegetables are cooked.
Recipes.description: Hearty and comforting stew with tender beef, potatoes, and carrots simmered in a rich and flavorful broth.

Recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
Recipes.preparation: Grill chicken breast until cooked through. Chop romaine lettuce and slice chicken. Toss lettuce with grated Parmesan cheese, croutons, sliced chicken, and Caesar dressing.
Recipes.description: A classic salad featuring grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and tangy Caesar dressing.

Recipes.name: Penne alla Vodka
Recipes.preparation: Cook penne pasta until al dente. In a separate pan, simmer minced garlic in butter. Add tomato paste and stir fry for 1 to 2 minutes, then deglaze with vodka. Pour in heavy cream and add pasta water until consistency is creamy. Toss cooked pasta in the sauce.
Recipes.description: A creamy and indulgent pasta dish featuring penne tossed in a rich vodka-infused tomato cream sauce.

Recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
Recipes.preparation: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Chop cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion. Mix cooked quinoa with chopped vegetables and diced avocado.
Recipes.description: A nutritious and colorful salad featuring protein-rich quinoa, crisp cucumbers, sweet cherry tomatoes, tangy red onion, and creamy avocado.

Recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Recipes.preparation: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cube it. Stir-fry tofu until golden. Add chopped broccoli, bell peppers, and sliced carrots. Cook until vegetables are tender. Stir in soy sauce.
Recipes.description: A healthy and satisfying stir-fry featuring protein-packed tofu and an array of colorful vegetables, all cooked in a savory soy sauce.

Recipes.name: Chickpea Curry
Recipes.preparation: Saut√© chopped onion until translucent. Add diced tomato and cook until soft. Stir in drained chickpeas, coconut milk, and curry powder. Simmer until heated through.
Recipes.description: A flavorful vegan curry featuring tender chickpeas cooked in a creamy coconut sauce infused with aromatic curry spices.

Recipes.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
Recipes.preparation: Rinse lentils and chop carrots, celery, and onion. In a pot, saut√© chopped vegetables until softened. Add lentils and vegetable broth. Simmer until lentils are tender.
Recipes.description: A hearty and nutritious vegan soup featuring protein-rich lentils and an assortment of vegetables simmered in flavorful vegetable broth.

Recipes.name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
Recipes.preparation: Rinse and drain chickpeas. Chop cucumber, red bell pepper, and red onion. Combine chickpeas and chopped vegetables with halved kalamata olives. Toss with olive oil and lemon juice.
Recipes.description: A refreshing and vibrant salad featuring protein-packed chickpeas, crisp cucumber, sweet bell pepper, tangy red onion, and briny kalamata olives, dressed with a simple olive oil and lemon dressing.

Recipes.name: Scampi
Recipes.preparation: Saut√© minced garlic in olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Pour in white wine, squeeze lemon, and garnish with chopped parsley.
Recipes.description: A delightful seafood dish featuring succulent shrimp cooked in a flavorful garlic and white wine sauce, brightened with fresh lemon and parsley.

Recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
Recipes.preparation: Slice beef thinly. Stir-fry beef until browned. Add broccoli and cook until tender. Mix soy sauce and ginger, pour over beef and broccoli. Serve over rice.
Recipes.description: A classic stir-fry featuring tender beef, crisp broccoli, and a savory soy-ginger sauce served over a bed of fluffy rice.

Recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
Recipes.preparation: Roll out pizza dough. Top with sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Bake until crust is golden. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.
Recipes.description: A simple and classic pizza featuring a thin crust topped with fresh tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and fragrant basil, finished with a drizzle of olive oil.

Recipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon
Recipes.preparation: Whisk together soy sauce, mirin, and brown sugar. Marinate salmon in the mixture. Grill until cooked through. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Recipes.description: Tender grilled salmon glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, finished with a sprinkle of toasted sesame seeds.

Recipes.name: Spinach-Feta Chicken Breast
Recipes.preparation: Butterfly chicken breasts. Saut√© spinach and garlic in olive oil. Stuff chicken with spinach, feta, and garlic mixture. Bake until chicken is cooked through.
Recipes.description: Juicy chicken breasts stuffed with a flavorful mixture of spinach, feta cheese, and garlic, baked to perfection.

Recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
Recipes.preparation: Cook linguine until al dente. Saut√© shrimp in olive oil with minced garlic. Toss cooked pasta with shrimp, lemon juice, and chopped parsley.
Recipes.description: A light and zesty pasta dish featuring succulent shrimp, linguine, and a refreshing lemon-garlic sauce, garnished with fresh parsley.

Recipes.name: Hawaiian Chicken Skewers
Recipes.preparation: Thread chicken, pineapple, and bell peppers onto skewers. Grill until chicken is cooked. Mix soy sauce and brown sugar for basting.
Recipes.description: Delicious grilled chicken skewers featuring a tropical blend of juicy pineapple, colorful bell peppers, and a sweet and savory soy glaze.

Recipes.name: Butternut Squash Risotto
Recipes.preparation: Saut√© diced onion and cubed butternut squash. Add Arborio rice and stir. Gradually add vegetable broth while stirring until rice is cooked. Stir in grated Parmesan cheese.
Recipes.description: Creamy and comforting risotto with the sweet and nutty flavor of butternut squash, finished with a generous sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

Recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
Recipes.preparation: Rub pork shoulder with BBQ seasoning. Slow-cook until tender. Shred meat and mix with BBQ sauce. Serve on buns with coleslaw and pickles.
Recipes.description: Tender pulled pork sandwiches smothered in tangy BBQ sauce, topped with crisp coleslaw, and served with pickles for a satisfying bite.

Recipes.name: Ratatouille
Recipes.preparation: Slice vegetables thinly. Arrange in a baking dish, alternating. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with herbs de Provence. Bake until vegetables are tender.
Recipes.description: A visually stunning and flavorful dish featuring layers of beautifully arranged vegetables baked to perfection with aromatic herbs de Provence.

Recipes.name: Pesto Pasta Cherry Tomatoes
Recipes.preparation: Cook pasta until al dente. Toss with basil pesto. Add halved cherry tomatoes, grated Parmesan, and toasted pine nuts. Mix well.
Recipes.description: A vibrant and flavorful pasta dish featuring al dente noodles coated in basil pesto, tossed with juicy cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, and toasted pine nuts.

Recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
Recipes.preparation: Cook fettuccine until al dente. Saut√© sliced chicken breast in butter. Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Toss with cooked pasta.
Recipes.description: Indulgent pasta dish featuring tender fettuccine noodles smothered in a rich Alfredo sauce made with succulent chicken, heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and butter.

Recipes.name: Mango Salsa Chicken
Recipes.preparation: Grill chicken until cooked through. Combine diced mango, red onion, cilantro, and lime juice to make salsa. Serve chicken topped with mango salsa.
Recipes.description: Grilled chicken thighs topped with a refreshing mango salsa featuring sweet mango, crisp red onion, fragrant cilantro, and a splash of lime juice.

Recipes.name: Lemon Herb Quinoa
Recipes.preparation: Rinse quinoa. Cook quinoa in vegetable broth. Fluff with a fork and add lemon zest, fresh herbs, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Recipes.description: Light and fluffy quinoa infused with the bright flavors of lemon and fresh herbs, perfect as a side dish or base for various protein options.

Recipes.name: Cajun Shrimp Pasta
Recipes.preparation: Cook fettuccine until al dente. Saut√© shrimp with Cajun seasoning. Add sliced bell peppers and cream. Toss with cooked pasta.
Recipes.description: A spicy and creamy pasta dish featuring Cajun-seasoned shrimp, colorful bell peppers, and fettuccine noodles, creating a bold and flavorful combination.

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Alio e Oglio
Recipes.preparation: Put olive oil into a large pan on medium heat and add sliced garlic. Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. When the garlic is browned, add splashes of pasta water and let it bubble, then add parsley. Add pasta to the pan and coat in the sauce.
Recipes.description: Enjoy this simple yet satisfying pasta classic when your fridge is almost empty. Parsley is optional, add any grated italian cheese of your choice.
